mapper.insert: insert into tb_file_statistic (id, file_id, relate_count, download_count, share_count) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fileId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{relateCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{downloadCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{shareCount,jdbcType=INTEGER})

id,
file_id,
relate_count, download_count, share_count,

mapper.update:
update tb_file_statistic
file_id = #{fileId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
relate_count = #{relateCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
download_count = #{downloadCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
share_count = #{shareCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.sql: id, tree_ids, code, ctime, edate, download_count, vcode

update tb_file_share

code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

edate = #{edate,jdbcType=DATE},

update tb_file_share set tree_ids = #{treeIds,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ctime = #{ctime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, edate = #{edate,jdbcType=DATE}, download_count = #{downloadCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, vcode = #{vcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
